## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:**	[evm.TU.scaffold_1438.63-Cmo](http://210.22.121.250:8880/asteraceae/browse/geneIdPage/evm.TU.scaffold_1438.63-Cmo)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>CmHSFA4</u>
- **Gene Name:** heat-shock factor A4
- **Genome:** [Chrysanthemum morifolium genome](http://210.22.121.250:8880/asteraceae/download/downloadPage)
- **Species:** *Chrysanthemum morifolium*

## Functional Descriptions:
   - Chrysanthemum **CmHSFA4** gene positively regulates salt stress tolerance in transgenic chrysanthemum.
   - **CmHSFA4** conferred salinity tolerance in chrysanthemum as a consequence of Na+/K+ ion and ROS homeostasis.
   - **CmHSFA4** overexpression retarded chlorophyll contents decrease under salinity stress.
   - Transcription factor **CmHSFA4**-CmMYBS3 complex enhances salt tolerance in chrysanthemum by repressing CmMYB121 expression.
   - **CmHSFA4**-CmMYBS3-CmTPL complex modulates CmMYB121 expression, consequently regulating the tolerance of chrysanthemum to salt. The findings shed light on the responses of plants to salt stress.
